verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:6
verses.text: So Amnon lay down, and made himself sick: and when the king was come to see him, Amnon said unto the king, I pray thee, let Tamar my sister come, and make me a couple of cakes in my sight, that I may eat at her hand.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:7
verses.text: Then David sent home to Tamar, saying, Go now to thy brother Amnon’s house, and dress him meat.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:8
verses.text: So Tamar went to her brother Amnon’s house; and he was laid down. And she took flour, and kneaded it, and made cakes in his sight, and did bake the cakes.
